info.title: Navigate forwards to a button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Print Page' button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Print Page' button.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
